title: Information Disclosure of Garbage Collection Cycle 'Again'

profile.name: Basecamp
profile.about: Basecamp is the leading online project manager and the birthplace of Ruby on Rails.

vulnerability_information:
**Summary :**
Hello team,

I was recently reading the hackerone hacktivity page and saw a report (https://hackerone.com/reports/981796) which was related to information disclosure on one of the subdomain of hey.com which was https://gopher.hey.com/metrics, so I thought of reproducing the issue and at first it gave me 404 not found error but when I clicked on reload I got the access to the page again. The issue was resolved in the above mentioned report but I don't know why it is still reproducible.

**Steps to reproduce :**

1. Go to https://gopher.hey.com/metrics
2. It will give you 404 not found error 
3. Click on the reload page and you'll have the access to the information on the page. 

*Note : Related POC of the reproduction steps is attached below*


Information Disclosed :

```
# HELP go_gc_duration_seconds A summary of the pause duration of garbage collection cycles.
# TYPE go_gc_duration_seconds summary
go_gc_duration_seconds{quantile="0"} 3.4094e-05

go_gc_duration_seconds_count 3398
```

## Impact

This information may help attackers understand more things about the target application which may help in further investigation and exploitation.
vulnerability_information_html:
Summary :
Hello team,

I was recently reading the hackerone hacktivity page and saw a report (https://hackerone.com/reports/981796) which was related to information disclosure on one of the subdomain of hey.com which was https://gopher.hey.com/metrics, so I thought of reproducing the issue and at first it gave me 404 not found error but when I clicked on reload I got the access to the page again. The issue was resolved in the above mentioned report but I don't know why it is still reproducible.

Steps to reproduce :

  1. Go to https://gopher.hey.com/metrics
  2. It will give you 404 not found error
  3. Click on the reload page and you'll have the access to the information on the page.

Note : Related POC of the reproduction steps is attached below

activities.message:
Hey @shrey3, thanks for sending this report! We'll take a look and let you know.

Rosa
activities.markdown_message:
Hey @shrey3, thanks for sending this report! We'll take a look and let you know.

Rosa

activities.message:
Confirmed. We'll get this fixed up soon. 
Rosa
activities.markdown_message:
Confirmed. We'll get this fixed up soon.
Rosa

activities.message: @rosa thanks for an update and the bounty :)
activities.markdown_message: @rosa thanks for an update and the bounty :)

activities.message: @rosa when I tried to reproduce it using curl command I wasn't getting any output on the cli but when I reproduced it using a web browser I first got the 404 not found and after reloading/refreshing the page I got the access to the sensitive information.
activities.markdown_message: @rosa when I tried to reproduce it using curl command I wasn't getting any output on the cli but when I reproduced it using a web browser I first got the 404 not found and after reloading/refreshing the page I got the access to the sensitive information.

activities.message: Thanks for the additional details, @shrey3! We've got this fixed up now.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for the additional details, @shrey3! We've got this fixed up now.

activities.message:
@rosa thanks for an update, the fix has been deployed perfectly.

Thank You :)
activities.markdown_message:
@rosa thanks for an update, the fix has been deployed perfectly.

Thank You :)

activities.message: @rosa I haven't received my payment yet. Have you sent it ?
activities.markdown_message: @rosa I haven't received my payment yet. Have you sent it ?

activities.message: @shrey3 yes! We awarded the bounty via HackerOne 2 days ago, haven't done anything special. Could you check with HackerOne's support in case there's some problem on their side?
activities.markdown_message: @shrey3 yes! We awarded the bounty via HackerOne 2 days ago, haven't done anything special. Could you check with HackerOne's support in case there's some problem on their side?
@rosa can I get a disclosure ?
